description:
The travel icon, Carmel Limo, is now available worldwide and nationwide at your fingertips. DOWNLOAD NOW and receive $66 FREE CAR CASH to use for your rides! Refer to friends and earn ADDITIONAL $6 CAR CASH for each friend that becomes a new user and takes a ride using the Carmel Limo app! Since 1978, Carmel has offered quality service at unbeatable prices. Now it’s easier than ever to reserve.
 
You can tap a Carmel car to you immediately or schedule one in advance, you decide. The Carmel Limo App pinpoints your current location and identifies available Carmel cars within the area. Users are able to decide the pick-up time, select the vehicle type, enter the destination, see the "no surprises" fare amount in advance, and pay for the ride, all within the app. Users can earn airline miles for using Carmel. You’re even able to store frequent rides, not just addresses, and instruct the app to save your ride itinerary directly into your calendar!

Once the reservation is made, sit back and track the location of your reserved car as it makes its way to you. THREE EASY TAPS and you’re on your way! Need a ride? Just Carmel it!
 
Why Carmel?
ON-TIME PICK-UP: Carmel's best practice, which got it the highest on-time record in New York City, has been implemented in the 310 locations Carmel services worldwide.

* UNBEATABLE PRICES: Carmel has proudly offered quality services at unbeatable prices since 1978. Carmel is famous for its super value proposition trip rates.

* CLEAR ITINERARY / FIXED PRICES: What you see is what you pay. Only Carmel Limo provides informative, fully transparent, detailed trip itineraries that include both pick-up and drop-off addresses, and displays a fixed price for the trip prior to purchase with no hidden charges or surprises. 

* 35 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE: Carmel is not a technology company pretending to be a transportation company, but a trusted brand in the car service industry since 1978 with high technological & logistic capabilities! 
 
* CARMEL CAR CASH DEAL: Upon the launch of the latest update, Carmel offers each new user (or updating user) $66 in Car Cash just for downloading!! Money to use on Carmel rides! PLUS, share the app with your friends to earn more Car Cash. When they enter your Carmel Code, they will get $6 extra Car Cash and when they take a ride with Carmel using the app, you will get additional $6 Car Cash. *Car Cash can be applied to up to 20% of each fair. 
 
* "WE'LL BE THERE FOR YOU" Need a ride? Just Carmel it!
trackCensoredName: Carmel Limo Car and Limousine Service
